function getIsProjectFunded(uint256 projectid) view returns (bool funded)
function getNumOfVotes(uint256 projectid) view returns (uint256 yes, uint256 no)
function getNumOfVotesPayment(uint256 projectid) view returns (uint256 yes, uint256 no)
function getProjectEligibleForPayment(uint256 projectid) view returns (bool eligible)
function getProjectInfo(uint256 activityid) view returns (string weburl, uint256 votedeadline, uint256[] paymentamounts, uint256[] payschedule)
function getProjectNextTLPayment(uint256 projectid) view returns (int256 next)
function getProjectOwner(uint256 projectid) view returns (address projectowner)
function getSurveyInfo(uint256 surveyid) view returns (string weburl, uint256 surveydeadline, uint256 numchoices, uint256 atmostchoice)
function getSurveyOwner(uint256 surveyid) view returns (address surveyowner)
function getSurveyResults(uint256 surveyid) view returns (uint256 numtaken, uint256[] results)
function getTLReceivedByProject(uint256 projectid) view returns (uint256 amount)
function isMember(address user) view returns (bool result)
